name: Labyrealm
description: This is the first game I've made. It took a friend and I about 4 weeks to make. It runs in vbscript even though i know the language isn't meant for games. I plan on remaking the game with a proper game engine later on.  To move you will have to type w, a, s, d, q, e 1, or 2 into the textbox (optionally  3 and 4 as well on pc). Please let me know of any bugs/problems you encounter. Lastly i made a keymap for Touchmote to play this game with the wii remote (it's a lot more playable with it).
